com.metreeca.rest.formats

Class JSONFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.Format<javax.json.JsonObject>
      • com.metreeca.rest.formats.JSONFormat

  • public final class JSONFormat
extends Format<javax.json.JsonObject>
    JSON body format.
    See Also:
    "https://javaee.github.io/jsonp/"

      • json

        public static Result<javax.json.JsonObject,Exception> json(Reader reader)
        Parses a JSON object.
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader the JSON object is to be parsed from
        Returns:
        a value result containing the parsed JSON object, if reader was successfully parsed; an error result containing the parse exception, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any argument is null

      • context

        public static Supplier<javax.json.JsonObject> context()
        Retrieves the default JSON-LD context factory.
        Returns:
        the default JSON-LD context factory, which returns an amepty context

      • aliaser

        public static Function<String,String> aliaser(javax.json.JsonObject context)
        Aliases JSON-LD property names.
        Parameters:
        context - the JSON-LD context property names are to be aliased against
        Returns:
        a function mapping from a property name to its alias as defined in context, defaulting to the property name if no alias is found
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context is null

      • resolver

        public static Function<String,String> resolver(javax.json.JsonObject context)
        Resolves JSON-LD property names.
        Parameters:
        context - the JSON-LD context property names are to be resolved against
        Returns:
        a function mapping from an alias to the aliased property name as defined in contextm defaulting to the alias if no property name is found
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if context is null

      • get

        public Result<javax.json.JsonObject,Failure> get(Message<?> message)
        Description copied from class: Format
        Retrieves a body representation from a message.

        Processing failure should be reported using the following HTTP status codes:

        • Response.UnsupportedMediaType for missing bodies;
        • Response.BadRequest for malformed bodies, unless a more specific status code is available.

        The default implementation returns a failure reporting the Response.UnsupportedMediaType status, unless explicitly overridden.

        Overrides:
        get in class Format<javax.json.JsonObject>
        Parameters:
        message - the message whose body representation managed by this body format is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the optional JSON body representation of message, as retrieved from the reader supplied by its ReaderFormat representation, if one is present and the value of the Content-Type header is equal to "application/json"; a failure reporting the Response.UnsupportedMediaType status, otherwise

      • set

        public <M extends Message<M>> M set(M message,
                                    javax.json.JsonObject value)
        Configures the WriterFormat representation of message to write the JSON value to the writer supplied by the accepted writer and sets the Content-Type header to "application/json", unless already defined.
        Overrides:
        set in class Format<javax.json.JsonObject>
        Type Parameters:
        M - the type of message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be configured to hold a body representation managed by this body format
        value - the body representation being configured for message by this body format
        Returns:
        the configured message
